---
category: news
title: "Germany approves Mercedes-Benz Level 3 Drive Pilot self-driving system for the road"
excerpt: "Mercedes-Benz recently announced its Level 3 self-driving system Drive Pilot has been approved by the German Federal Motor Transport Authority (KBA) and can now operate on roads in Germany. Mercedes-Benz is slated to begin selling its S-Class and EQS models with Drive Pilot in the first half of 2022."
